LanguageData.Efficient.degreeDatas.0.label: 高效工人
LanguageData.Efficient.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a highly efficient worker, resulting in increased productivity。
LanguageData.Slacker.degreeDatas.0.label: 懒鬼
LanguageData.Slacker.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is a slacker and spends as little time as possible working。
LanguageData.Focused.degreeDatas.0.label: 专注
LanguageData.Focused.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is focused and gets things done slightly faster。
LanguageData.Forgetful.degreeDatas.0.label: 健忘
LanguageData.Forgetful.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME is forgetful and gets things done slightly slower。
LanguageData.LazyEye.degreeDatas.0.label: 慵懒
LanguageData.LazyEye.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a rather unfortunate disability for being on a RimWorld. HECAP has a lazy-eye, making hitting anything much harder
LanguageData.Marksman.degreeDatas.0.label: 神射手
LanguageData.Marksman.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has displayed a natural affinity for ranged weapons and abhors close quarters combat.
LanguageData.Fat.degreeDatas.0.label: 肥胖
LanguageData.Fat.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME hates exercise, and despite the fact that HE eats as much as a normal person, HIS sedentary lifestyle has made HIM exceptionally fat。
LanguageData.Fit.degreeDatas.0.label: 健康
LanguageData.Fit.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME loves exercise, and HIS time spent conditioning HIS body has paid off。
LanguageData.Agoraphobia.degreeDatas.0.label: 旷野恐惧症
LanguageData.Agoraphobia.degreeDatas.0.description: NAME has a fear of open spaces, while HE can manage relatively fine in them, HE is much more comfortable indoors。
